title: Everything you need to know before the solar eclipse
itunes:author: American Public Media
description: On Monday, August 21, a total solar eclipse will be visible on a path that crosses the U.S., from Oregon on the west coast to South Carolina on the east coast. In this episode, we cover all your eclipse essentials: What causes an eclipse? What happens during an eclipse? How do you safely view it? Spoiler alert: Donâ€™t stare at the sun without special eyewear.
